rule: The next line must not include a list of people names.
input: Names Nil, even when famous individuals grace content.
coverage:
Company names: 
People names: Nil
Specific topics: famous individuals
General themes: names, content
validityText:
The input specification requires the input to be a string containing a passage of text. This text can include names of companies, names of people, specific topics, or general themes relevant to the content. The provided input "Names Nil, even when famous individuals grace content." is a string. It refers to the absence of names, even when famous individuals are present in the content. This indirectly relates to the requirement of including names in the passage. However, the specification only states that the input "can" include names but does not make it a mandatory requirement. Therefore, the lack of names in this input does not violate the specification, as it does not explicitly mandate their presence. The input can be a passage of text even if it is stating that there are no names mentioned. Based on the provided specification, there is no violation.

OK
